definitions.definition: To come up from a lower to a higher position.
definitions.example: to arise from a kneeling posture

definitions.definition: To come up from one's bed or place of repose; to get up.
definitions.example: He arose early in the morning.

definitions.definition: To spring up; to come into action, being, or notice; to become operative, sensible, or visible; to begin to act a part; to present itself.
definitions.example: A cloud arose and covered the sun.
